Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: ~tock : Thanks for this! Since we cannot merge this one yet, I will move it to FAB-11863. This will allow me to mark the current parent story (FAB-11474) as Done.

Action.author: tock
Action.body: I'll rebase this on top of https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-13011 once it is merged.

Action.author: tock
Action.body: Need to rebase this one on top of https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-13011

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: ~tock : Can we prioritize this over the completion of the migration work? This will help with the imminent 1.4.1 release. Let me know what you think.

Action.author: tock
Action.body: ~kchristidis Sure, no problem. I'll start with this ASAP.
